signatures.text: inline fun <T, R : Comparable<R>> Array<out T>.sortBy( crossinline selector: (T) -> R?)
signatures.desc: Sorts elements in the array in-place according to natural sort order of the value returned by specified selector function.

signatures.text: inline fun <T, R : Comparable<R>> MutableList<T>.sortBy( crossinline selector: (T) -> R?)
signatures.desc: Sorts elements in the list in-place according to natural sort order of the value returned by specified selector function.
